articles.description: Former Page 3 model Ms Ramplin, who also presented Hollywood celebrity show Tinseltown, killed herself at her home in Malaga in January this year, 18 months after her son's death.
articles.content:
Former glamour model turned TV presenter Sam Ramplin, who once dated Batman actor Michael Keaton, hanged herself 18 months after her teenage son died in a motorbike crash, an inquest heard today.
